_header: Ye that have the king to demean
Subjects: warnings; advice, to princes; Henry VI; political poems
_description: A warning to King Henry VI — ten 6-line stanzas

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines:
Ye that haue the kyng to demeneAnd ffrauncheses gif theym
                    ageyne…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines:
…That traitoure shall providMore Reson can not be
                    mevidþere shall hit be made good
